channel.title: *f2p\p2p scape =92% DONE=*
channel.description:
alright, so i decided to make a server that was HALF free to play, but the other half pay to play.[not really PAY TO PLAY, but you need to be a registered members sumwhere]. anyways, their was a bunch of things wrong with this project:
*if i made a members area..wouldn't f2p'ers come over and get onto it?
that was the BIGGEST problem..so i decided to put members home in edgeville, but lately i have thinking where to put it..so i may or may not move it later on.. but here is what i got so far:
*CREDITS* 30% - butter/coca for custom items and client.. 20% - empirescape for wolf's cure quest. 5% - tutorials on moparscape ;) 45% - meh, coding and dividing up places..
----------------------------------------------------------------------------- i'm currently thinking about putting f2p on one side of the world map; and p2p on the other side but i'm not quite shure how i want that to work..anyways here is sum of the st00f it contains..
----F2P---- *no starting gear; but 25M with 1000 of each rune..etc. *had custom pvp city in wildy; multi members\f2p can fight; NO LOOTING *most likely going to take out custom items.. *NO acess to grandexchange *ALL f2p skills work; no skillcapes for them though >:) *lumbridge is all pk'ing city (:. *2 quest: -cooks assistant }=============the reward from BOTH these quest is 45M.. -black knights fortress }============= *have shops all around in every city - almost 52% done.. *all spells work. *free ::alch spell for easy cash *15 minigames. *[b]thats just about it for f2p..[/b]
---P2P--- *all custom items 150+ *KBD *jad; 63 fightcave waves. *castlewars *acess to grandexchange *4 quest *pVp 0wnt box *have acess to EVERYTHING f2p has. *has ancients;lunars. *vengance *summoning *all 24 skills are trainable *dragon claws, vestas, statius, morrigans etc..
--------------------------------CURRENTLY WORKING ON-------------------------------- i'm been checking out the [b]MODELS[/b] section of the fourms..and i really like what i see so next post im giving credits to every1one over their. i just downloaded pvp armor - so once i add that in i'll post it up ;) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ well post what you think - feel free to be [i]HAR[/i][b]SH[/b] all complainants/criticism is accepted. thanks! ~SHERMAN~ **************UPDATES****************** -New Barrows with full tunnel!
-fully working cannon w/bases - if you use steel with cannon ball maker u make cannon ball..
-when server gets 50 people on, automatically teleports you to fally part area, x-mas cracker and party hats get dropped!
-took out ALL customs - add elite black, all pvp armor, full dragon hai [thanks noobscape ;D]
-almost done! posting download link for source and client SOON..

@Sherman wrote:

f2p games is more respect full.[/quote]

you really think so? my f2p-scape has so SO many glitches right now…when ever you kill a hill giant, it spawns in the sky lmfao…imagine a big fat ass baby in a diaper in MId air O.O

item.title: *f2p\p2p scape =92% DONE=*
item.dc:creator: @Sherman Sherman
item.description:
@Sherman wrote:

alright, so i decided to make a server that was HALF free to play, but the other half pay to play.[not really PAY TO PLAY, but you need to be a registered members sumwhere]. anyways, their was a bunch of things wrong with this project:

*if i made a members area…wouldn’t f2p’ers come over and get onto it?

that was the BIGGEST problem…so i decided to put members home in edgeville, but lately i have thinking where to put it…so i may or may not move it later on… but here is what i got so far:

CREDITS
30% - butter/coca for custom items and client…
20% - empirescape for wolf’s cure quest.
5% - tutorials on moparscape
45% - meh, coding and dividing up places…

i’m currently thinking about putting f2p on one side of the world map; and p2p on the other side but i’m not quite shure how i want that to work…anyways here is sum of the st00f it contains…

----F2P----
*no starting gear; but 25M with 1000 of each rune…etc.
*had custom pvp city in wildy; multi members\f2p can fight; NO LOOTING
*most likely going to take out custom items…
*NO acess to grandexchange
*ALL f2p skills work; no skillcapes for them though >:)
*lumbridge is all pk’ing city (:.
*2 quest:
-cooks assistant }=============the reward from BOTH these quest is 45M…
-black knights fortress }=============
*have shops all around in every city - almost 52% done…
*all spells work.
*free ::alch spell for easy cash
*15 minigames.
*thats just about it for f2p…

—P2P—
*all custom items 150+
*KBD
*jad; 63 fightcave waves.
*castlewars
*acess to grandexchange
*4 quest
*pVp 0wnt box
*have acess to EVERYTHING f2p has.
*has ancients;lunars.
*vengance
*summoning
*all 24 skills are trainable
*dragon claws, vestas, statius, morrigans etc…

--------------------------------CURRENTLY WORKING ON--------------------------------
i’m been checking out the MODELS section of the fourms…and i really like what i see so next post im giving credits to every1one over their.
i just downloaded pvp armor - so once i add that in i’ll post it up

well post what you think - feel free to be HARSH all complainants/criticism is accepted. thanks!
~SHERMAN~
UPDATES****
-New Barrows with full tunnel!

-fully working cannon w/bases - if you use steel with cannon ball maker u make cannon ball…

-when server gets 50 people on, automatically teleports you to fally part area, x-mas cracker and party hats get dropped!

-took out ALL customs - add elite black, all pvp armor, full dragon hai [thanks noobscape ;D]

-almost done! posting download link for source and client SOON…

Read full topic
